condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for most disadvantaged children.
No of states with an endorsed communication strategy and materials to promote understanding and adoption of life skills on menstrual hygiene management

actual.value: 2014:The NHM departments in 3 states (UP, Bihar and Jharkhand) endorsed the Communication Strategy on menstrual health and hygiene. title.narrative: Knowledge base on adolescents for relevant policies and programmes, available to government and other partners.

actual.value: 2014:The following knowledge products on adolescent's were generated - Formative research and baseline, documentation of life skills programmes of ICPS, assessment of rollout of SABLA and mapping of adolescent issues in Gujarat and mapping of partners and adolescent programmes in Odisha. title.narrative: Relevant government programs at state and national level dealing with adolescent issues have appropriate strategies (*) for enhancing the life skills of adolescents.

baseline.value: TBD (based on a desk review and other studies related to this area).

target.value: 2017:national – yes, states – 8 out of 15 (depending from baseline).

actual.value: 2014:Shared understanding and consensus on a strategic communication framework for the Rashtriya Kishor Swathya Karyakram (RKSK) was developed with the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare through a national consultation with senior government functionaries and experts on adolescent issues. title.narrative: Proportion of most deprived and vulnerable adolescents in selected areas who feel confident to use life skills to participate actively in social activities and to demand their rights and entitlements.
